channel.title: now-reading on Learning from Error
channel.description: Recent content in now-reading on Learning from Error

item.title: 10 October, 2021
item.description: Books Non-fiction An Ugly Truth: Inside Facebook’s Battle for Domination, by Sheera Frenkel & Cecilia Kang What I think should become the definitive book about the inner workings of the giant.

item.title: 14 Feb, 2021
item.description: Books Non-fiction Honestly, I don’t have the appetite for non-fiction at this time of the quarter. But if I do come across one, it’ll make its way here.

item.title: 15 Nov, 2020
item.description: Books Non-fiction Race After Technology, by Ruha Benjamin Part of the week’s readings in the ‘Technologies of Race-Making’ seminar.

item.title: 8 Nov, 2020
item.description: Books Non-fiction Algorithms of Oppression, by Safiya Noble Discussing this book in class sent me on a tizzy. I was pushed on my anti-monopolist and free speech arguments.
